divs: Sighting Detailsat exactly 5:30 am i went outside to look at the new bright star or planet that has been in our eastern sky for a couple of weeks now .down about 1 inch and to the left of the star a bright flash appeared in the sky .it lasted about 2 seconds and looked as if it left a trail going right towards the bright star or planet.the sky did not light up but it was brilliant. did anyone else see this . thanks dean burgess
trends: There have been no other sightings in Canton
This sighting has never been favorited.
